DOC.brief_summary: A study confirm superiority celecoxib 100 mg BID loxoprofen 60 mg TID incidence gastroduodenal endoscopic ulcer 2 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Celecoxib In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers Endoscopic evidence ulceration , erosion active bleeding etc . esophagus , stomach , pylorus and/or duodenum prior treatment endoscopy A history gastrointestinal ulcer Any use celecoxib , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( include aspirin ) , antiulcer medication , antacid , systemic steroid antibiotic within four week prior first dose study medication
